kā gaṇanā tu sarveṣām
saṃkalanena punar asya dhvaneḥ trayaḥ bhedāḥ
vyaṅgyasya tri rūpa tvāt
tathā hi kiñcid vācya tām sahate kiñcid tu anyathā
tatra vācya tā saham a vicitram vicitram ca iti
a vicitram vastu mātram vicitram tu alaṅkāra rūpam

original: yadyapi prādhānyena tadalaṅkāryaṃ tathāpi brāhmaṇaśramaṇanyāyena tathocyate /
analyzed: yadi api prādhānyena tat alaṅkāryam tathā api brāhmaṇa śramaṇa nyāyena tathā ucyate
rasa ādi lakṣaṇaḥ tu arthaḥ svapne na vācyaḥ
sa hi rasa ādi śabdena śṛṅgāra ādi śabdena vā abhidhīyeta
na ca abhidhīyate tad prayoge vibhāva ādi aprayoge tasya apratipatteḥ tad aprayoge pi
vibhāva ādi prayoge tasya pratipatteḥ ca iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām vibhāva ādi abhidhāna dvāreṇa eva
pratīyate iti niścīyate
tena asau vyaṅgyaḥ eva
mukhya artha bādhā ādi abhāvāt na punar lakṣaṇīyaḥ

original: arthāntarasaṃkramitātyantatiraskṛtavācyayorvastumātrarūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ vinā lakṣaṇaiva na bhavatīti prāk pratipāditam /
analyzed: artha antara saṃkramita atyanta tiraskṛta vācyayoḥ vastu mātra rūpam vyaṅgyam vinā lakṣaṇā eva na bhavati iti prāk pratipāditam

original: śabdaśaktimūle tu abhidhāyā niyantraṇenānabhidheyasyārthāntarasya tena sahopamādera[raṃ]laṅkārasya ca nirvivādaṃ vyaṅgatvam /
analyzed: śabda śakti mūle tu abhidhāyāḥ niyantraṇena anabhidheyasya artha antarasya tena saha upamā ādeḥ araṃlaṅkārasya ca nirvivādam vyaṅga tvam
raṃ is needless

original: arthaśaktimūle 'pi viśeṣe saṃketaḥ kartu[ṃ] na yujyate iti sāmānyarūpāṇāṃ padārthānāmākāṅkṣā-saṃnidhi-yogyatāvaśātparasparasaṃsargo
analyzed: artha śakti mūle pi viśeṣe saṃketaḥ kartum na yujyate iti sāmānya rūpāṇām padārthānām ākāṅkṣā saṃnidhi yogya tā vaśāt paraspara saṃsargaḥ
viśeṣa rūpaḥ vākya arthaḥ tatra abhihita anvaya vāde
kā vārttā vyaṅgyasya abhidheya tāyām
yam api āhuḥ
śabda vṛddha abhidheyān ca pratyakṣeṇa atra paśyati
śrotuḥ ca pratipanna tvam anumānena ceṣṭayā
anyathā anupapattyā tu bodhet śaktim dvaya ātmikām
arthāpattyā avabodheta saṃbandham tri pramāṇakam
kumārilabhaṭṭa
iti pratipādita diśā devadatta gām ānaya ityādi uttama vṛddha vākya prayogāt deśa antaram

original: sāsnādimantamarthaṃ madhyamavṛddhe nayati sati anenāsmādvākyādevaṃvidho 'rthaḥ pratipannaḥ
analyzed: sāsnādimantam artham madhyama vṛddhe nayati sati anena asmāt vākyāt evaṃvidhaḥ rthaḥ pratipannaḥ
iti tad ceṣṭayā anumāya tayoḥ akhaṇḍa vākya vākyārthayoḥ arthāpattyā vācya vācaka bhāva lakṣaṇam
saṃbandham avadhārya bālaḥ tatra vyutpadyate

original: parataḥ caitra gāmānaya devadatta aśvamānaya devadatta gāṃ naya ityādivākyaprayoge tasya tasya
analyzed: paratas caitra gām ānaya devadatta aśvam ānaya devadatta gām naya ityādi vākya prayoge tasya tasya

original: śabdasya taṃ tamarthamavadhārayatīti anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pravṛttinivṛttikāri vākyameva
analyzed: śabdasya tam tam artham avadhārayati iti anvaya vyatirekābhyām pravṛtti nivṛtti kāri vākyam eva
prayoga yogyam iti vākya sthitānām eva padānām anvitaiḥ padārthaiḥ anvitānām eva saṃketaḥ

original: gṛhyate iti viśiṣṭā eva padārthā vākyārthāḥ /
analyzed: gṛhyate iti viśiṣṭāḥ eva padārthāḥ vākya arthāḥ
na tu padārthānām vaiśiṣṭyam

original: yadyapi vākyāntaraprayujyamānānyapi pratyabhijñāpratyayena tānyevaitāni padāni niścīyanta iti padārthāntaramātreṇānvitaḥ padārthaḥ saṃketagocaraḥ
analyzed: yadi api vākya antara prayujyamānāni api pratyabhijñā pratyayena tāni eva etāni padāni niścīyante iti padārtha antara mātreṇa anvitaḥ padārthaḥ saṃketa gocaraḥ
tathā api sāmānya avacchāditaḥ viśeṣa rūpaḥ eva asau
pratipadyate vyatiṣaktānām padārthānām tathābhūta tvāt iti anvita abhidhāna vādinaḥ

original: teṣāmapi mate sāmānyaviśeṣarūpaḥ padārhaḥ saṃketaviṣaya ityativiśeṣabhūto vākyārthāntargatosaṃketitatvādavācya
analyzed: teṣām api mate sāmānya viśeṣa rūpaḥ padārhaḥ saṃketa viṣayaḥ iti ati viśeṣa bhūtaḥ vākya artha antargata usaṃketita tvāt avācya

original: eva yatra padārthaḥ pratipadyate tatra dūre arthāntarabhūtasya niḥśeṣacyutetyādau vidhyādeścarcā /
analyzed: eva yatra padārthaḥ pratipadyate tatra dūre artha antara bhūtasya niḥśeṣa cyuta ityādau vidhi ādeḥ carcā

original: ananvito 'rtho 'bhihitānvaye padārthāntaramātreṇānvitastvanvitābhidhāne anvitaviśeṣastvavācya eva ityubhayanaye 'pyapadārtha eva vākyārthaḥ
analyzed: ananvitaḥ rthaḥ bhihita anvaye padārtha antara mātreṇa anvitaḥ tu anvita abhidhāne anvita viśeṣaḥ tu avācyaḥ eva iti ubhaya naye pi apadārthaḥ eva vākya arthaḥ
yat api ucyate naimittika anusāreṇa nimittāni kalpyante iti

original: tatra nimittatvaṃ kārakatvaṃ jñāpakatvaṃ vā śabdasya /
analyzed: tatra nimitta tvam kāraka tvam jñāpaka tvam vā śabdasya
prakāśaka tvāt na kāraka tvam
jñāpaka tvam tu ajñātasya katham

original: jñātatvañca saṃketenaiva sa cānvitamātre evaṃ ca nimittasya niyatanimittatvaṃ
analyzed: jñāta tvam ca saṃketena eva sa ca anvita mātre evam ca nimittasya niyata nimitta tvam

original: yāvanna niścitaṃ tāvannaimittikasya pratītireva katham iti 'naimittikānusāreṇa nimittāni kalpyante ';
analyzed: yāvat na niścitam tāvat naimittikasya pratītiḥ eva katham iti naimittika anusāreṇa nimittāni kalpyante
iti avicārita abhidhānam

original: ye tvabhidadhati so 'yamiṣoriva dīrghadīrghataro vyāpāraḥ iti yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārthaḥ iti vidhirevātra vācya iti /
analyzed: ye tu abhidadhati saḥ yam iṣoḥ iva dīrgha dīrghataraḥ vyāpāraḥ iti yad paraḥ śabdaḥ sa śabda arthaḥ iti vidhiḥ eva atra vācyaḥ iti
te pi a tātparya jñāḥ tātparya vācoyukteḥ devānām priyāḥ

original: tathāhi {bhūtavyasamuccāraṇe bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyate} iti kārakapadārthāḥ kriyābhisaṇbandhāt sādhyāmānatāṃ prāpnuvanti /
analyzed: tathā hi bhūtavya samuccāraṇe bhūtam bhavyāya upadiśyate iti kāraka padārthāḥ kriyā abhisaṇbandhāt sādhya amāna tām prāpnuvanti
tatas ca adagdha dahana nyāyena yāvat aprāptam tāvat vidhīyate
yathā ṛtvij pracaraṇe pramāṇa antarāt siddhe

original: {lohitoṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti} ityatra lohitoṣṇīṣatvamātraṃ vidheyaṃ havanasyānyataḥ siddheḥ {dadhnā juhoti} ityādau dadhyādeḥ karaṇatvamātraṃ  #
analyzed: lohita uṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti atra lohita uṣṇīṣa tva mātram vidheyam havanasya anyatas siddheḥ dadhnā juhoti ityādau dadhi ādeḥ karaṇa tva mātram
vidheyam

original: kvacidubhayavidhiḥ kvacittrividhirapi yathā {raktaṃ paṭaṃ vayaḥ} ityādau ekavidhirdvividhistrividhirvā /
analyzed: kvacid ubhaya vidhiḥ kvacid tri vidhiḥ api yathā raktam paṭam vayaḥ ityādau eka vidhiḥ dvi vidhiḥ tri vidhiḥ vā

original: tataśca {yadeva vidheyaṃ tatraiva tātparyam} ityupāttasyava śabdasyārthe tātparya na tu pratītamātre evaṃ hi {pūrvo dhāvati} ityādāvaparādyathapi  #
analyzed: tatas ca yat eva vidheyam tatra eva tātparyam iti śabdasya arthe na tu pratīta mātre evam hi pūrvaḥ dhāvati ityādau
kvacid tātparyam syāt

original: yattu {viṣaṃ bhakṣaya mā cānya gṛhe bhuṅkthāḥ} ityatra {etadgṛhe na bhoktavyam} ityatra tātparyamiti sa eva vākyārtha iti,
analyzed: yat tu viṣam bhakṣaya mā ca anya gṛhe bhuṅkthāḥ iti atra etad gṛhe na bhoktavyam iti atra tātparyam iti saḥ eva vākya arthaḥ iti

original: ucyate tatra cakāra ekavākyatāsūcanārthaḥ na cākhyātavākyayor dvayoraṅgāṅgibhāva
analyzed: ucyate tatra cakāraḥ ekavākyatā sūcana arthaḥ na ca ākhyāta vākyayoḥ dvayoḥ aṅga aṅgibhāva
iti viṣa bhakṣaṇa vākyasya suhṛd vākya tvena aṅga tā kalpanīyā iti viṣa bhakṣaṇāt api duṣṭam etat gṛhe

original: bhojanamiti sarvathā māsya gṛhe bhuṅkthāḥ} iti,
analyzed: bhojanam iti sarvathā mā asya gṛhe bhuṅkthāḥ iti
upātta śabda arthe eva tātparyam

original: yadi śabdaśruterantaraṃ yāvānartho labhyate tāvati śabdasyābhidhaiva vyāpāraḥ tataḥ kathaṃ 'brāhmaṇa putraste jātaḥ brāhmaṇa kanyā te garbhiṇī';
analyzed: yadi śabda śruteḥ antaram yāvān arthaḥ labhyate tāvati śabdasya abhidhā eva vyāpāraḥ tatas katham brāhmaṇa putraḥ te jātaḥ brāhmaṇa kanyā te garbhiṇī
ityādau harṣa śoka ādīnām api na vācya tvam
kasmāt ca lakṣaṇā lakṣaṇīye pi arthe dīrgha dīrghatara abhidhā vyaāpāreṇa eva pratīti siddheḥ

original: kimiti ca śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānāṃ pūrvapūrvabalīyastvam ityanvitābhidhānavāde 'pi vidherapi siddhaṃ vyaṅgyatvam //
analyzed: kim iti ca śruti liṅga vākya prakaraṇa sthāna samākhyānām pūrva pūrva balīyaḥ tvam iti anvita abhidhāna vāde vidheḥ api siddham vyaṅgya tvam

original: kiṃ ca {kuru rucim} iti padayorvaiparītye kāvyāntarvartini kathaṃ duṣṭatvam /

original: na hmatrāsabhyo 'rthaḥ padārthāntarairanvitaḥ ityanabhidheya eveti evamādi aparityājyaṃ syāt /

original: yadi ca vācyavācakatvavyatirekeṇa vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvo nābhyupeyate tadāsādhutvādīnāṃ nityadoṣatvaṃ kaṣṭatvādīnāmanityadoṣatvamiti

vibhāga karaṇam anupapannam syāt
na ca anupapannam sarvasya eva vibhakta tayā pratibhāsāt

original: vācyavācakabhāvavyatirekeṇa vyaṅgyavyañjakatāśrayaṇe tu vyaṅgyasya bahuvidhatvāt kvacideva kasyacidevaucityenopapadyata eva vibhāgavyavasthā

original: api ca vācyo 'rthaḥ sarvān pratipattṝn prati ekarūpa eveti niyato 'sau /

original: na hi {gatostamarkaḥ} ityādau vācyo 'rthaḥ kvacidanyathā bhavati /

analyzed: abhisaraṇam upakramyatām iti prāpta prāyaḥ te preyān iti karma karaṇāt nivartāmahe iti sāṃdhyaḥ

original: vidhirupakramyatāmiti dūraṃ mā gā iti surabhayo gṛhaṃ praveśyantāmiti saṃtāpodhunā
analyzed: vidhiḥ upakramyatām iti dūram mā gāḥ iti surabhayaḥ gṛham praveśyantām iti saṃtāpa udhunā

analyzed: na bhavati iti vikreya vastūni saṃhriyantām iti na āgata udyā api preyān ityādiḥ anavadhiḥ vyaṅgyaḥ

original: {kassa va ṇa ho-i roso daṭṭhūṇa pi-ā-i savvaṇaṃ aharaṃ /
analyzed: kassa va ṇa hoi rosaḥ daṭṭhūṇa piāi savvaṇam aharam

atra upameyasya śaṅkha ādeḥ anirdeśe śaśinaḥ grahaṇam atiricyate iti adhikapadatvam

original: liṅgavacanabhedo 'pi upamānopameyayoḥ sādhāraṇaṃ cet dharmamanyarūpaṃ kuryāt /

original: tadā ekatarasyaiva taddharmasamanvayāvagateḥ saviśeṣaṇasyaiva tasyopamānatvamupameyatvaṃ vā pratīyamānena dharmeṇa
analyzed: tadā ekatarasya eva tad dharma samanvaya avagateḥ sa viśeṣaṇasya eva tasya upamāna tvam upameya tvam vā pratīyamānena dharmeṇa

original: pratīyate iti prakāntasyārthasya sphuṭamanirvāhādasya bhagnaprakramarūpatvam / yathā ----

original: yatra tu nānātve 'pi liṅggavacanayoḥ sāmānyābhidhāyi padaṃ dvarūpabhedaṃ nāpadyate na tatraitaddūṣaṇāvatāraḥ ubhayathāpi asya anugamakṣamasvabhāvatvāt  #

original: dadhate sma parāṃ śobhāṃ tadīyā vibhramā iva //593//}

original: kālapuruṣavidhyādibhede 'pi na tathā pratītiraskhalitarūpatayā viśrāntimāsādayatītyasāvapi bhagnaprakramatayaiva vyāptaḥ / yathā

original: ityādau ca gaṅgā pravahati na tu pravahatu iti apravṛttapravartanātmano vidheḥ /

original: nanu samānam uccāritaṃ pratīyamānaṃ vā dharmāntaramupādāya paryavasitāyām upamāyām upameyasya prakṛtadharmāmisaṃbandhānna kaścitkālādibhedo  #
analyzed: nanu samānam uccāritam pratīyamānam vā dharma antaram upādāya paryavasitāyām upamāyām upameyasya prakṛta dharma amisaṃbandhāt na kaścid kāla ādi bhedaḥ

original: avagamyate yathā {yudhiṣṭhira ivāyaṃ satyaṃ vadati} iti tatra yudhiṣthira iva satyavādyayaṃ satyaṃ vadatīti pratipatsyāmahe /
analyzed: avagamyate yathā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ iva ayam satyam vadati iti tatra yudhiṣthiraḥ iva satya vādī ayam satyam vadati iti pratipatsyāmahe

original: satyavādī satyaṃ vadatīti ca na paunaruktyam āśaṅkanīyam raipoṣaṃ puṣṇātītivat
analyzed: satya vādī satyam vadati iti ca na paunaruktyam āśaṅkanīyam raipoṣam puṣṇāti itivat
yudhiṣthiraḥ iva satya vadanena satya vādī ayam iti artha avagamāt

original: satyametat kiṃ tu sthiteṣu prayogeṣu samarthanamidaṃ na tu sarvathā niravadyam prastutavastupratītivyādhātāditi savetasa evātra pramāṇam //
analyzed: satyam etat kim tu sthiteṣu prayogeṣu samarthanam idam na tu sarvathā niravadyam prastuta vastu pratīti vyādhātāt iti sa vetasaḥ eva atra pramāṇam

analyzed: kevalasya asya sādhārmyam eva pratipādayitum paryāpta tvāt tasya ca asyām avivakṣita tvāt iti

yathā

original: tatsamarthanāya yat arthāntaranyāsopādānam tat ālekhyamiva gaganataletyantamasamīcīnamiti nirviṣayatvametasya /

original: saṃbhāvitena tu rūpeṇa pratibhāsamānasyāsya na kācidanupapattiravataratīti vyartha eva tatsamarthanāyāṃ yatnaḥ /

original: sādhāraṇaviśeṣaṇavaśādeva samāsoktiranuktamapi upamānaviśeṣaṃ prakāśayatīti tasyātra punarupādāne prayojanābhāvāt anupādeyatvaṃ yat tat apuṣṭārthatvaṃ  #
